website_summaries.verdict: Modern look in a wall-mounted faucet that features a vessel-style design.
pros: Offered in two finish options, brushed nickel or chrome
Gives you a modern design with square faucet handles, a rectangular wall plate, and a vessel-style faucet
Good build quality that should last for a long time, as it contains high-quality materials and a useful design
cons: Costs a little more than most options
Only 1.2 gallons per minute flow rate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking faucet we install this over the mirror and we are very please
customer_reviews.author: Henry C.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure everything is tightened down
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and finish. I had only two problems with it. First was the cold water valve had not been tightened down at factory and within one day of use was gushing water down wall. Tightened it down and resolved. The other is that unless you bottom the spout when inserting, it will leak. Fixed that with a custom cut piece of 3/4 PVC pipe and 2 rubber gaskets. So unless you are real good at measuring for your backsplash, it will probably leak. Lots of nylon tape will not fix it. Now that it is not leaking at all, I love it. The 1.0Gpm restrictor was perfect for my application.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Junk, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Fought with this faucet for weeks. If the value seems to good to be true it probably is!!! the fautcet will not screw in far enough to prevent it from leaking, one of the handles allen bolts was all stripped and couldn't secure the handle. Big time buyers remorse. Wish I could return :( Spend the extra $200-$800 extra and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Techguy2012

customer_reviews.title: Great looking faucet but was let down!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive this item. When it arrived it came used and very dirty, like someone had installed it and returned it. It looked great but was also missing the double valve. Which must had been taken out when returned.
customer_reviews.author: Chez B

customer_reviews.title: Wall mount faucet
customer_reviews.text: We just remodeled our bathroom and my husband picked out this wall mounted faucet. It looks Beautiful and so modern. We are so happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking faucet, with a long enough nozzle for wall-mounting above a Roman tub.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Wonder modern faucet! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is modern and sleek! We love the look so much! The water flow is softer because of the design, which is fine for a bathroom. I use the stainless cleaner once a week on it so it stays perfect looking.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Sanfillipo

customer_reviews.title: High quality wall mount faucet!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice faucet set. It's hard to find wall-mounted faucet sets! Installation went well and this is a quality unit. I wish the spout was not as long for our application.
customer_reviews.author: Startrain

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t order again
customer_reviews.text: This faucet looks good n beautiful. I can’t use because it was leaking. I only used the flat plate n order another faucet
customer_reviews.author: Shawnette

customer_reviews.title: IT DRIPS
customer_reviews.text: Installed it and waited 2 weeks to be sure there were no issues. Then installed 6K of tile around it and and a week later it began to drip non stop. Contacted the company and got I set up to get replacement parts and called back and Tiffany was no longer with the company. Got it set up again and still waiting for them to ship parts.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Brownell

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE! Hubby says was easy to install. Looks amazing...works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Rick & Tyna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great faucet and the price is even better looks so high end
customer_reviews.author: erin uciechowski

customer_reviews.title: Great product! We did have a plumber install but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We did have a plumber install but only because it was traditional vanity faucet before so the wall mount was a little different.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: looked nice but leaked and couldn't get it to stop, returned and got the refund quickly
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice presentation upon arrival. I paired with a copper sink in a guest bathroom and love the look. My installation was handled by a professional and after 9 months, no problems with leaks. Good value for a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: TX Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I used these faucets for my master bathroom double vanity .Its gives a clean contemporary look. The water pressure is just right....
customer_reviews.author: Garnett Williams

customer_reviews.title: Obviously used or previously installed
customer_reviews.text: They were used, dinged, dented, in deplorable condition. Teflon tape on both ends.
customer_reviews.author: In Rain

customer_reviews.title: Great looker
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. All brass. Very nice looking. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent, looks better than in the pictures......excelente, luce mejor que en las fotografias
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Faucet
customer_reviews.text: I love this faucet. High quality and looks great. Can't wait to have it installed.
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap, I doubt it will last long. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: david bailey

customer_reviews.title: I love this faucet
customer_reviews.text: I love this faucet. It is good quality and looks great in my bathroom. Easy to hook up and shipping was fast
customer_reviews.author: Mom V.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use. The spout was such a loose fit it was so unstable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all. leaked a lot. the threading are very loose. It discouraged me to get another wall mount faucet. I did end up re patching all the damages on the wall and other pipes repairs because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Paulo

customer_reviews.title: had to send back
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as refurbished - shame on me for wanting a good deal - and it leaked, even after installation by a licensed plumber. We sent it back and exchanged it for a completely different brand/model
customer_reviews.author: Ceecee

customer_reviews.title: It does a better job of filling the tub now a nd water ...
customer_reviews.text: We thought it was for our tub. But when it came it had a low flow valves and took forever to fill the tub. We had to totally disassemble it and rank the little suckers out. It does a better job of filling the tub now a nd water splatters a bit. Was hard finding what we wanted in wall mount version.
customer_reviews.author: JPArtist

customer_reviews.title: Blocks water pressure. Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed with the water pressure. This has everything to do with these faucets. The amount of water that trickles out also makes getting hot water take an eternity. And we have on demand. With such crummy pressure these aren’t worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Much better product then the last wall mount I bought that kept leaking internally. Solid construction , heavy feel and great finish.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but fragile
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful hardware for the bathroom. Looks so expensive in person!! Beware because the Metal is a bit fragile and you have to be careful not to dent upon installation. Also the water flows very slow from the spout unless you remove the circle piece inside.
customer_reviews.author: Coolgirl7

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, plumber did not love the hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. My 3 star review is based on my plumber not loving this item.
customer_reviews.author: K. Star

customer_reviews.title: Beware, leaks after a few years. I'm having a lot of trouble finding repair parts.
customer_reviews.text: Leaks badly after 4 1/2 years. I have Delta faucets that are older and don't leak at all.
customer_reviews.author: S. Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Bad mixer
customer_reviews.text: The whole drainage pop up was missing , and all disk cartridges were leaking!!!! I ordered 3 pieces and all of them are leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Essa alali

product_meta.title: VIGO VG05002BN Titus Two Handle Wall Mount Bathroom Faucet, Brushed Nickel Lavatory Faucet, Unique Plated 7 Layer Finish
feature_bullets: EFFORTLESSLY MODERN: The minimalistic design of this wall mounted bathroom faucet is intended to subtly complement your contemporary bathroom, without being too ostentatious. With smooth, rectangular proportions, this wall mount faucet easily completes any bath decor.

CONVENIENT DUAL HANDLE USABILITY: Control water temperature and flow to your liking with the dual lever design of this wall mount bathroom faucet. Bathroom faucet function at a standard rate of 1.2 GPM flow rate.

SUPERB RESILIENT FINISHES: This lead-free nickel bathroom faucet is equipped for durability with a premium 7-layer antique brushed nickel finish. The faucet also includes a matching brass pop up drain, exclusive to the brushed nickel finish.

ENDURING COMMERCIAL CRAFTSMANSHIP: The high-quality, German made ceramic Sedal disc cartridge is tested for up to 500,000 uses, ensuring against leakage and dripping. A brass construction guarantees long lasting use over time, while the mineral resistant nozzle prevents wear.

UTMOST STANDARDS OF EXCELLENCE: Vigo’s restroom faucet is compliant and certified in the following: cUPC, NSF-61, NSF-372, AB1952 and WaterSense that ensures safe water for drinking and other usage purposes.

LET’S GET TECHNICAL: This bathroom faucet has a handle faceplate width of 11” and height includes: 3.125-inch. The length between the center to center handle width is 8-in and the spout reach is: 8.375-inch.

LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY: All VIGO bathroom faucets boast a strong limited lifetime warranty on all finishes and structural related components, as well as a 5-year warranty on faucet cartridges for full service protection.

specifications.Certification: NSF Certification, No ADA Compliant, WaterSense
specifications.Special Features: Easy to Install, Easy to Clean, Ceramic Disc Valves; Corrosion Resistant; Drip Free; Easy to Install; Hot/Cold Indicators; Low Flow; Low Lead; Tarnish Resistant; Fingerprint/Spot Resistant
specifications.Included Components: All Mounting Hardware; Faucet; Handles; Supply Lines
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars61 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
